highlights.description: Organization rename from agentplexus to plexusone

changed.description: **Breaking**: Go module path changed from `github.com/agentplexus/multi-agent-spec` to `github.com/plexusone/multi-agent-spec`
JSON Schema `$id` URLs updated to new GitHub raw URLs

highlights.description: Workflow categories: deterministic (chain, scatter, graph) and self-directed (crew, swarm, council)
Collaboration config for self-directed workflows with lead agents, task queues, and consensus rules
MkDocs documentation site with Material theme

added.description: Message schema (`schema/message/message.schema.json`) for inter-agent messaging
Workflow categories: `deterministic` and `self-directed`
Workflow types: `chain`, `scatter`, `graph` (deterministic); `crew`, `swarm`, `council` (self-directed)
CollaborationConfig with `lead`, `specialists`, `task_queue`, `consensus`, `channels`
ConsensusRules with `required_agreement`, `max_rounds`, `tie_breaker`
Channel types: `direct`, `broadcast`, `pub-sub`
Agent role fields: `role`, `goal`, `backstory`
DelegationConfig with `allow_delegation`, `can_delegate_to`, `can_receive_from`
Team fields: `collaboration`, `self_claim`, `plan_approval`
Message types: delegate_work, ask_question, share_finding, request_approval, challenge, vote, etc.

documentation.description: MkDocs documentation site with Material theme
Release notes for v0.1.0 through v0.6.0
Complete agent.md with role fields and DelegationConfig
Complete team.md with all workflow types and collaboration config
Complete deployment.md with self-directed platform mappings
Complete sdk/go.md with full API reference

highlights.description: Content blocks for rich report content (lists, tables, metrics, kv_pairs)
Narrative renderer for Pandoc-friendly Markdown output
mas CLI tool for rendering team reports

added.description: ContentBlock types: kv_pairs, list, table, text, metric
Constructor functions: NewKVPairsBlock, NewListBlock, NewTableBlock, NewTextBlock, NewMetricBlock
TeamReport: Title, SummaryBlocks, FooterBlocks, Summary, Conclusion fields
TeamSection: ContentBlocks, Narrative fields
NarrativeRenderer for Pandoc-friendly Markdown (PDF-ready)
LLM evaluation types: EvaluationType, LLMEvaluation, CombinedWeights, Issue, Severity, Effort
LLM evaluation extension schema (llm-evaluation.schema.json)
mas CLI: render subcommand with box and narrative formats
mas CLI: --validate flag for JSON Schema validation

changed.description: TeamSection.Tasks is now optional (can use ContentBlocks instead)

documentation.description: ENHANCEMENT-content-blocks.md - content block design and usage

highlights.description: Schema codegen pipeline: Go types are now the source of truth
New deployment platforms: Gemini CLI, ADK Go, CrewAI, AutoGen
TypeScript SDK auto-generated from JSON Schema

added.description: Codegen pipeline: Go → JSON Schema → TypeScript/Zod
`tools/generate/` - Go schema generator using invopop/jsonschema
`sdk/typescript/scripts/generate-schemas.mjs` - TypeScript/Zod generator
`Makefile` - Orchestrates full codegen pipeline
New platforms: GeminiCLI, ADKGo, CrewAI, AutoGen with typed configs
RuntimeConfig, StepRuntime, RetryPolicy, ObservabilityConfig for deployment targets
Go SDK: JSONSchema() methods on enum types for proper schema generation
Go SDK: Typed platform config fields on Target
Icon field in agent schema

changed.description: **Breaking (Go SDK)**: `Target.Config json.RawMessage` replaced with typed config fields
TypeScript SDK now auto-generated from JSON Schema
JSON Schemas regenerated with proper enum values and descriptions

removed.description: Go SDK: `Target.Config` field (use typed config fields instead)
TypeScript SDK: Manual `schemas.ts` (replaced by generated schemas)

highlights.description: Add namespace support for organizing agents into subdirectories

added.description: Optional `namespace` field in agent schema for organizing agents
Recursive directory scanning in `LoadAgentsFromDir` - agents in subdirectories get namespace from directory name
`LoadAgentsFromDirFlat` function for non-recursive loading (backward compatibility)
`LoadAgentFromFile`, `LoadTeamFromFile`, `LoadDeploymentFromFile` loader functions in Go SDK
`Namespace` field on Agent struct in Go SDK
`AllowedTools` field on Agent struct in Go SDK
`QualifiedName()` method on Agent to get `namespace/name` format
`ParseQualifiedName()` function to split qualified names
`WithNamespace()` builder method on Agent
YAML struct tags on all Agent fields
Support for `namespace/agent-name` references in team schema (agents, orchestrator, step.agent)

documentation.description: README section on nested agent directories with examples

added.description: Tasks to agent schema with `id`, `description`, `type`, `command`, `pattern`, `file`, `required`, `expected_output`, `human_in_loop` fields
DAG-aware topological sorting for team reports
Team status report IR and renderer (NASA-style Go/No-Go validation)

changed.description: Rename `checks` to `tasks` in report schema for consistency

documentation.description: Installation section with Go SDK tagging notes

highlights.description: Initial release with platform-agnostic agent definitions and multi-language SDKs

added.description: JSON schemas for agent, team, and deployment definitions
Go SDK with model/tool mappings for Claude Code, Kiro CLI, AWS Bedrock, and AgentKit
Python SDK with Pydantic models
TypeScript SDK with Zod schemas
Example stats-agent-team with multi-platform outputs

documentation.description: README with architecture overview, schemas, and usage examples

infrastructure.description: GitHub Actions CI workflow for Go SDK testing
GitHub Actions lint workflow with golangci-lint

fixed.description: CI workflows working-directory set to sdk/go
